channel.title: Is it possible to "export" a full and static dashboard as a zip file?
channel.description:
I mean with export a "100% copy" of the dashboard HTML, together with "embedded data" or same-directory-json/csv-data files (all in a zip file) so that i could copy that dashboard on a USB stick or attach it to an email or to host is on a "standalone" webserver (without database connection)?
I mean, i only need a freezed version of that dashboard (no live-data; no SQL query execution) - like a snapshot (not a screenshot). A static export/copy of a dashboard.
Is there such an zip-file export build-in or available by a plugin or helper tool?
(i am very new on redash)

item.title: Is it possible to "export" a full and static dashboard as a zip file?
item.dc:creator: gaaady
item.description:
You might want to try creating a public shareable link and use a 3rd party tool/service to download a static copy of it

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to "export" a full and static dashboard as a zip file?
